title: "Jikker(Jax): Signals to be Careful" x10
body:
Team still goes for Elder when all below 1/4th health and enemy at full health in full pursuit and then wonder why we lost.  I had to deal with a frozen lane against Jayce early so lack of CS, had a lot of CS stolen by MF when trying to defend, still went Legendary assassinating Shaco many times before he could kill MF, and we almost were gonna win until my Bronze team decided to not listen to the guy that shot calling started to win the game back.

-sigh-

I like Jax btw, nice suggestion though I still suck with him
